sub_title: Omni Channel Storyteller at Epica Media
summary: Filming and storytelling is something which is in Martijn Bruyns’ blood. Having grown up in a film production family, it is no wonder that he would also follow the same career path. With more than 20 years of experience in writing, producing, directing, filming and editing for Endemol, Warner, Simpel Media, Endemol Shine, Epica Media and Maeckers he is well versed in every aspect of studio and location production. His projects that have scanned the globe, from North to South and East to West taking with him a sense of privilege as he captures real life situations turning them into compelling stories. Martijn’s modus operandi is to tell real and engaging stories so that the audience lives the moment.

awards.title: Child right Award 2016
awards.description:
De prijs is toegekend door het ChildRight Fund, dat zich breed inzet voor minderbedeelde kinderen. Het initiatief wordt door een groot aantal Nobelprijswinnaars ondersteund. Het bestuur, unaniem in zijn beslissing, vindt het werk van Van den Heuvel niet alleen bijzonder en lovenswaardig, maar prijst de programmamaker ook omdat de primaire belangen van de desbetreffende kinderen nooit in het geding zijn.

“Dat laatste is het allerbelangrijkste”, vindt Van den Heuvel. “Het mag nooit over hun rug gaan. Daar zou ik ook nooit voldoening uit kunnen halen. Toen RTL met het idee kwam, heb ik meteen gezegd: we gaan kinderen helpen door ze in een veilige situatie te brengen. Mijn andere programma’s gaan over boeven vangen, dit gaat over kinderen. Het is mooi dat ChildRight dat heeft opgepikt.”

“RTL heeft destijds enorm zijn nek uitgestoken. Het is een controversieel onderwerp, er werd met argusogen naar gekeken.” Intussen is Van den Heuvel al bezig met het maken van zijn vierde seizoen. “Wat mij betreft kunnen we er nog lang mee doorgaan. Het is een enorme uitdaging de camera in te zetten om iets gedaan te krijgen.”

“Ik heb zelfs nog contact met ouders en kinderen uit de eerste serie. In veruit de meeste gevallen kunnen we concluderen dat we goed werk hebben verricht. Wat we willen, is dat kinderen contact houden met beide ouders. Vaak lukt dat. Er zijn gevallen bij waarin ouders hun ontvoerde kind nooit meer gezien zouden hebben als wij het programma niet hadden gemaakt.”

Er gaat zelfs een preventieve werking uit. “Na twee seizoenen begon de marechaussee plotseling streng te controleren op minderjarigen die met één ouder op reis gingen. Het is kinderlijk eenvoudig een kind te ontvoeren. Dat probleem is nu beter op de kaart gezet.”

awards.title: De gouden televizier ring 2004
awards.description:
Wie de Gouden Televizier-Ring wint, is verzekerd van een plekje in televisiehistorie. In 2004 won de realitysoap rond volkszanger Frans Bauer en zijn gezin: De Bauers.
Volkszanger Frans Bauer stal in het najaar van 2003 de harten van de kijkers met de realitysoap over zijn dagelijks leven. Hij bleek nog gewoner dan iedereen al vermoedde en stak dat in De Bauers niet onder stoelen of banken. We zagen dat hij zijn moeder een keer of vijf per dag belt en dat zijn vrouw Mariska de lekkerste schnitzels van de wereld bakt en, op z’n gat afvegen na, alles voor hem doet.

projects.description: Commissioned by the IR. D.F. Woudagemaal IQ Media produces a VR platform. I was responsible for the preparations of the shoot, the recordings and I supervised the post production process.

contributors.headline: Omni Channel Storyteller at Epica Media

projects.title: RTL 4 No Surrender (broadcast 1 episode)
projects.description:
John Van Den Heuvel reveales the true story behind motorcycle gang No Surrender.
During several occasions the members of the club were filmed and interviewed. The result was a never shown
documentary about Hell‘s Angels biggest rival. The documentery was broadcasted primetime on RTL4 a had a marketshare of +20% within the target audience.

contributors.headline: Omni Channel Storyteller at Epica Media

projects.title: RTL 5 Royal Canin Dog Challenge (broadcast 6 episodes)
projects.description:
The Royal Canin Dog Challenge,
presented by Martin Gaus, is a
championship for dogs. In the series dog owners pair up in teams and
compete eachother in agility, dog dance and catch and go. The series was
produced in cooperation with Royal Canin.

contributors.headline: Omni Channel Storyteller at Epica Media

projects.title: RTL 7 Master Classics of Poker 2011 (broadcast 1 episode)
projects.description: In Master Classics of Poker 2011, we follow Sascha Visser as he competes in the main event. During the episode multiple players are interviewed and the viewer gets a peek behind the scene of Holland Casino.

contributors.headline: Omni Channel Storyteller at Epica Media

projects.title: 2B De Pokerkampioen van Vlaanderen (broadcast 16 episodes)
projects.description: After the immense success of `Dutch Poker Champ’, in 2010 a successful little brother was launched in Flanders as ‘the Pokerkampioen van Vlaanderen’. In total, the first event of this size in Flanders hosted 25.000 Flemish players, of which 500 competed in the finals that were covered live.

contributors.headline: Omni Channel Storyteller at Epica Media

projects.title: Multiple European Broadcasters European City Poker Tour Barcelona (broadcast 1 live episode)
projects.description: One, 50 minute, live registration of the ECPT 2010 in Barcelona. Full ENG coverage of the whole event, including storyline telling of the Main Event. Extra emphasis was put on the Barcelona experience of the players, by real life shooting in hotel rooms, during late night parties and beach side dinners.

contributors.headline: Omni Channel Storyteller at Epica Media

projects.title: Multiple Russian Broadcasters Russian Poker Series 2010 Kiev, Riga & Sharm el Sheik, (broadcast 9 episodes)
projects.description: The Russian Poker Series is a poker tournament series that is broadcasted in Russia and the Ukraine. The registration per event consists of three episodes of 45 minutes each, that focuses on the final table of the Main Event. However there is special attention for the course of every tournament that is reflected in the Series Leader board. There is special attention for hand and tournament analysis. The programs are delivered turnkey for the Russian and Ukrainian audiences, so completely dubbed with graphics in Russian.

contributors.headline: Omni Channel Storyteller at Epica Media

projects.title: Prima TV (Romania) Clubul de Poker (broadcast 8 episodes)
projects.description:
8 Romanian Celebrities join each other in a quest to become the first gold member of the poker club of Bucharest (clubul de poker). They are submitted to serious poker challenges, lessons and ranking games during their stay in the poker club. In the end only one of them can stay. In episode 4 two celebrities are eliminated. They are replaced by two online qualifiers. They play two
eighthanded semifinals after which three players are elminated. The remaining five players are joined by one superqualifier for the sixhanded final.

contributors.headline: Omni Channel Storyteller at Epica Media

projects.title: RTL 5 More than just a game (broadcast 16 episodes)
projects.description:
In More Than Just a Game, the most famous poker players from the Netherlands are being followed in an exciting real life program. Fatima Moreira de Melo, Marcel Luske, Lex Veldhuis, Thierry van den Berg, Pieter de Korver and Noah Boeken travel the world to participate in the biggest and most prestigious poker tournaments. In sixteen episodes, the viewer gets a realistic insight in the way Team Pokerstars members live their “normal” life in the Netherlands. But next to this, we join them during their stay at the various international poker
tournaments, their losses, moments of glory and sometimes even during
complex semi political issues they have to face.

contributors.headline: Omni Channel Storyteller at Epica Media

projects.title: RTL 7 De Pokerkampioen van Nederland 2010 (broadcast 16 episodes)
projects.description: Simpel Sports organised a nationwide freeroll, with live coverage of the final 4 days. This freeroll was named `Dutch Poker Champ’. Over six weeks, players could qualify for the finals by playing weekly tournaments in their local bar or, if the bars were full, they could qualify online through the second chance competition. During this second chance competition, 150.000 unique players tried to qualify. In 2009, the second event hosted 16.000 players throughout bars in the Netherlands, of which 520 competed in the finals that were covered live. The success of `Dutch Poker Champ’ continued in 2010. Even more play- ers entered the event, that resulted in 15 television shows. In total, more than 200.000 players competed.

contributors.headline: Omni Channel Storyteller at Epica Media

projects.title: Megasport Russia / STB Ukraine Russian Poker Tour Moscow / St Petersburg (broadcast 8 episodes)
projects.description: The Russian Poker Tour 2009 is an international poker tournament that took place in Moscow and St. Petersburg. Simpel Sports made a two-episode registration of each tournament

contributors.headline: Omni Channel Storyteller at Epica Media

projects.title: Multiple European Broadcasters Unibet Open Algeve & London (6 episodes)
projects.description: The Unibet Open is an international poker tournament organized in different countries across Europe. Although the main focus is still an exciting poker tournament, Unibet also wants to make sure every player has a lot of fun outside the poker arena. The best hotels, the biggest parties and different fun side-events are all part of the experience. Simpel Sports did the television recordings of the Unibet tournaments in Portugal and London, but also took care of the registration of the experiences of the players. All the episodes proof that playing poker is definitely fun.

contributors.headline: Omni Channel Storyteller at Epica Media

profile_positions.description:
The destination were artists, innovators, storytellers and producers push the boundaries of media creation in this new digital age.

Driven by strong creative concepts and rooted in the innovative techniques, operational excellence and our ‘get the job done’ mentality we create outstanding content for every kind of screen. Our approach enables us to capture and translate sacred moments and transform them into inspiring epic moments.

profile_positions.description:
Das Ziel waren Künstler, Innovatoren, Geschichtenerzähler und Produzenten, die die Grenzen des Medienschaffens in diesem neuen digitalen Zeitalter überschreiten.

Angetrieben von starken kreativen Konzepten und verwurzelt in den innovativen Techniken, der operativen Exzellenz und unserer Mentalität, den Job zu erledigen, erstellen wir herausragende Inhalte für alle Arten von Bildschirmen. Unser Ansatz ermöglicht es uns, heilige Momente einzufangen, zu übersetzen und in inspirierende epische Momente umzuwandeln.
profile_positions.title: Founder | Managing & Creative Director | Omni Channel Storytellers

profile_positions.location: Sint Vitusstraat 18, 1211 PH Hilversum The Netherlands
profile_positions.title: Producent | Entertainment

profile_positions.description:
10-4 media is a full-service production company specializing in audiovisual storytelling. We produce for cinema, broadcast, video on demand and various social media channels. Our approach to real life entertainment pushes boundaries and enables us to capture sacred moments and transform them into inspiring stories.

10-4 is code for message understood, the objective of everything we create. We believe real life entertainment needs to evolve to the next level of storytelling. Our mission is to connect with the audience, fire their imagination and stir their soul. 

We are the creative and tactical one-stop shop. From the first idea to the final output, we create everything in-house from idea to concept development, script writing to filming, editing to bringing a polished product to the market. Our experienced team consists of prize-winning producers, directors, and tactical specialists with varied backgrounds within the Police force. The stories we tell have a strong connection with human rights and animal welfare.
profile_positions.title: Founder, Managing & Creative Director

profile_positions.description:
Force Field is one of the world’s largest development studios dedicated to
developing state of the art Virtual Reality (VR) and Augmented Reality (AR), creating high-end games, innovative TV & video content. I was responsible for creating and implementing VR workflow within the production, recording and post
production process.
profile_positions.title: Executive Producer

profile_positions.description: Simpel Media, part of Endemol Shine Group is a full service television production company were creativity and efficiency are key. It produces content for all major broadcasters in the Netherlands. Well known titles are Ik Vertrek, Het Mooiste Meisje van de Klas, Ontvoerd, Op de Vlucht, Lauren!, Grenzeloos Verliefd, Viva la Frans en Diagnose Gezocht.
profile_positions.title: Founding Partner, Producer & Creative Director

profile_positions.description: Simpel Sports is an internationally oriented television production company based in Amsterdam, The Netherlands. The company focuses on the development, production, distribution and sale of TV programs, formats and marketing con¬cepts. Its management consists one of the founding partners of international television production company Eyeworks. Simpel Sports is one of the few European production companies with specific knowledge of the world’s most popular card game, poker. Since its founding in 2005, the company has gained a lot of expertise in this field. This expertise ranges from live coverage of international poker tournaments such as the Master Classics of Poker, the Unibet Open, the Russian Poker Tour and the Russian Poker Series to entertainment shows such as Veronica Poker, Stars of Poker and Late Night Stars of Poker. A full list of productions is found in section 4 of this document. With offices in Amsterdam, Antwerp and Budapest, the company is flexible in many ways and able to achieve the highest level of service and production quality in short production periods. The Simpel Sports poker team consists of young talent, refined poker experts and several experienced, prize-winning creatives in the field of tv production. Our specialized staff in combination with use of our full service in-house (SD and HD) AVID video post production facilities, Simpel Sports can offer its clients the flexibility needed for these highly specialized kind of productions.
profile_positions.title: Creative Director, Producer, Program Director & Chief Editor

profile_positions.description:
Eyeworks is an Amsterdam-based international television production company founded by Reinout Oerlemans, Robert van den Bogaard and Ronald van Wechem.
As of June 2014, it is a wholly owned subsidiary of the Warner Bros. Television Group.
profile_positions.title: Program & Item Director
